knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
install.packages("tibbletime")
library(tibbletime)
library(dplyr)
```



```{r read data, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
file<-'../../data/NYPD_Arrest_Data__Year_to_Date_.csv'
data_2021 <- read.csv(file)
file2 <- '../../data/NYPD_Arrests_Data__Historic_.csv'
data_2006_2020 <- read.csv(file2)
```

```{r chr to date}
data_2021 <- data_2021 %>%
  mutate(ARREST_DATE = as.Date(data_2021$ARREST_DATE, "%m/%d/%Y"))


data_2006_2020 <- data_2006_2020 %>%
  mutate(ARREST_DATE = as.Date(data_2006_2020$ARREST_DATE, "%m/%d/%Y"))


```


```{r filter history data}
data_2019_2020 <- data_2006_2020 %>%
  filter(ARREST_DATE >= as.Date("2019-01-01"), ARREST_DATE <= as.Date("2020-12-31"))
```

```{r}
colnames(data_2021) [19] <- "Lon_Lat"

data_2019_2021 <- data_2019_2020 %>%
  full_join(data_2021)
```
